name: space-next
desc: Responsive site displaying two dynamic lists with data acquired from SpaxeX REST API, done in Next.js, styled in SCSS

name: hello-mern
desc: App letting you log in, register, show all users or delete any of them while updating all data constantly in MongoDB using Express.js server. Front-end done in clear React.

name: crypto-articles-api
desc: Flask API which scrapes and returns cryptocurrency news, for the project Exchange.

name: exchange
desc: [IN PROGRESS] Cryptocurrency market app containing functions such as listing cryptocurrencies, showing detailed data about a given cryptocurrency or news from the world of cryptocurrencies.

name: dsapp
desc: All data structures, algorithms and programming problems which I have studied and tried to understand. All files are in Python, in most cases documented and ready to use.

name: lux-moto
desc: My first project in React, written in old class components. Also first time used SCSS. Project at the moment is not possible to run due to old dependencies.

name: is-your-password-safe
desc: Script checking how many times your password leaked/was breached using haveibeenpwned.com API and good old Python.

name: 30-tweets
desc: Python script printing in console last 30 tweets of any user (default Eminem) using Twitter API.
